header.title: Find your next developer
header.subtitle: Boost the innovative power of your company

body.part1: Welcome to an inspiring conversation with concrete tips on how you can boost the innovative power of the company by building more diversified teams. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to network with newly graduated and hungry developers with an international IT background.
body.part2: There is a great demand for skills, especially in tech and many companies are looking with light and lantern for developers. At the same time, we have a lot of talent in Sweden whose expertise is not useful, despite an international background in the tech industry.
body.part3: How can we become better at making use of the skills that are available? In what way can increased diversity strengthen the business and boost innovation? What should you think about to create the best conditions for a diversified team?

part4.title: Participating in the panel:
list: XX, program manager Universal tech stars (working name, would be good with a name for the education)
Roshanak Fatahian, founder of All of UsMagnus Höij, union director of InnovationsföretagenXX

footer: Concrete tips, new contacts, drinks and snacks are promised.
